long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The GTR cursor helps time awareness & being calm when browsing, by visually changing the cursor's color (green to red) or shape according to predefined settings such as time or browsing purpose.
The extension works in predefined time cycles you choose, so it will split browsing and working into cycles (boosts productivity)
